title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Transport of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Transport of 

Dangerous Goods by Rail) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 30 June 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (transport dangerous good rail) (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 30 june 2023

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended -
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended - 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following definition for the definition of 
“Directive”: 

“ ‘Directive’ means Directive 2008/68/EC of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 24 September 20081, as 
amended by - 

(a) Commission Directive 
September 20103, 

2010/61/EU

 [306] 3 

(e) Commission Directive (EU) 2018/1846 of 23 

November 20187, 

(f) Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of 20 June 20198, 

(g) Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2020/1833 

of 2 October 20209, and 

(h) Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2022/2407 

of 20 September 20222; ”, and 

(b) by the substitution of the following definition for the definition of 

“RID”: 

“ ‘RID’ means the Regulations concerning the International 
Carriage of Dangerous Goods by Rail (RID), appearing as 
Appendix C to the Convention concerning International Carriage 
by Rail (COTIF) concluded at Vilnius on 3 June 1999 as 
applicable with effect from 1 January 2009, and the Annex to 
those Regulations as referred to in section II.1 in Annex II to the 
Directive and as applicable with effect from 1 January 2023;”.

text_raw:

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and
heading: (This is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the European Communities 
(Transport of Dangerous Goods by Rail) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 651 of 2010) 
in line with the technical amendment made by Commission Delegated Directive 
(EU) 2022/2407 of 20 September 2022 in regard to inland transport of dangerous 
goods by rail (RID). 

The Annexes to Directive 2008/68/EC (the main EU Directive on the inland 
transport of dangerous goods) have been further adapted to scientific and 
technical progress by Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2022/2407 and the 
definitions for “Directive” and “RID” in S.I. No. 651of 2010 have been amended 
to reflect these changes. Regulations 7(1)(d)(i) and 12(3)(c)(i) have also been 
amended, along with Schedule 1, to update references to RID in keeping with 
changes to the 2023 version. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [306] 5
